messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: The 0perati0n was a success, but n0t with0ut its hitches. Lieutenant Greg0ry Banks had to take charge sooner than expected due to the sudden illness of Captain Martinez. Despite the setbacks, the team managed to secure the perimeter and gather the necessary evidence. Detective Lara Gibson found a crucial piece of evidence that was overlooked by the initial response team. Officer N0lan and his K-9 unit, Officer Rex, were instrumental in tracking down the suspect's escape route. Meanwhile, Technician Sarah James was tasked with analyzing the digital footprints left behind by the perpetrators. The operation concluded with Sergeant O'Connor coordinating the apprehension efforts, which led to the eventual capture of the suspects. Officer Name: Lieutenant Gregory Banks Officer Context: Had to take charge of the operation due to Captain Martinez's sudden illness. Officer Role: Commanding Officer Officer Name: Captain Martinez Officer Context: Fell ill and was unable to lead the operation. Officer Role: Commanding Officer Officer Name: Detective Lara Gibson Officer Context: Found a crucial piece of evidence missed by the initial response team. Officer Role: Lead Investigator Officer Name: Officer Nolan Officer Context: Along with his K-9 unit, Officer Rex, was key in tracking the suspect's escape route. Officer Role: K-9 Unit Handler Officer Name: Technician Sarah James Officer Context: Analyzed digital footprints of the perpetrators. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Sergeant O'Connor Officer Context: Coordinated the apprehension efforts leading to the arrest of the suspects. Officer Role: Field Supervisor
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lieutenant Gregory BanksOfficer Context: Had to take charge of the operation due to Captain Martinez's sudden illness.Officer Role: Commanding OfficerOfficer Name: Captain MartinezOfficer Context: Fell ill and was unable to lead the operation.Officer Role: Commanding OfficerOfficer Name: Detective Lara GibsonOfficer Context: Found a crucial piece of evidence missed by the initial response team.Officer Role: Lead InvestigatorOfficer Name: Officer NolanOfficer Context: Along with his K-9 unit, Officer Rex, was key in tracking the suspect's escape route.Officer Role: K-9 Unit HandlerOfficer Name: Technician Sarah JamesOfficer Context: Analyzed digital footprints of the perpetrators.Officer Role: Forensic TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant O'ConnorOfficer Context: Coordinated the apprehension efforts leading to the arrest of the suspects.Officer Role: Field Supervisor
